content: TE DRS-5 Dust removal system On-board vacuum system for convenient dust collection when drilling or chiseling with the TE 5-22 cordless rotary hammer ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > On-board dust removal systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Virtually dustless drilling – contributes to safer jobsites and better visibility of your work area by removing up to 97% of fine particles before they become airborne Faster repeat drilling – dust removal system includes depth gauge with ruler so you can easily drill to the required depth every time Increased comfort – vibration-reducing effect on the rotary hammer Versatile – suitable for dust collection while drilling and chiseling, including stop drill bits and setting tools for HDI-P drop-in anchors (optional extraction heads may be needed) Applications OSHA 1926.1153 Table 1 compliant, virtually dust-free drilling with TE 5-22 cordless rotary hammers (max. drilling depth 5-3/8”) ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: TE 5-22 G01 Weight: 2.6 lb. Hammer drilling diameter range: 5/32 - 25/32 in Technical Data | For use with | TE 5-22 G01 | Weight | 2.6 lb | Hammer drilling diameter range | 5/32 - 25/32 in | Maximum drilling depth | 5.31 in | Need vacuum cleaner | No | Container volume | 500 cm³ ### ITEMS- 2342387 - Dust removal system TE DRS-5 HEPA bulk - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HEPA Dust removal system - 0.2x Bag
